column2: Kobe Bean Bryant (born August 23, 1978) is an American retired professional basketball player and businessman.
Wayne Mark Rooney (; born 24 October 1985) is an English professional footballer who plays for Premier League club Everton.
Rasheed Abdul "Sheed" Wallace (born September 17, 1974) is an American retired professional basketball player who played 16 seasons in the National Basketball Association (NBA).
Kyle Elliot Korver (born March 17, 1981) is an American professional basketball player for the Cleveland Cavaliers of the National Basketball Association (NBA).
Shikhar Dhawan (born 5 December 1985) is an Indian international cricketer.
Scottie Maurice Pippen (born September 25, 1965) is an American former professional basketball player who played in the National Basketball Association.
Muhammad Ali (; born Cassius Marcellus Clay Jr.; January 17, 1942 – June 3, 2016) was an American professional boxer and activist.
Kyrie Andrew Irving (, born March 23, 1992) is an American professional basketball player for the Boston Celtics of the National Basketball Association (NBA).
Damien Gareth Walters (born 6 April 1982) is a British Freerunner and former gymnast from Derbyshire who specialises in tumbling and trampoline.
